title: Update Home hero copy and consolidate CTA to a single Get started link

requirements.summary: Update Home page hero headline and subheadline copy.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero, the main H1 reads "High Performance Game Servers" (same styling as before).
On the Home page hero, the supporting paragraph reads exactly: "Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games."

file_operations.description: Update marketingContent.hero.headline to "High Performance Game Servers" and marketingContent.hero.subheadline to "Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games." so the HeroSection renders the new copy on Home.

requirements.summary: Replace the two Home hero CTA buttons with a single primary "Get started" button linking to /plans via TanStack Router Link.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero CTA area shows exactly one button.
The single button label is exactly "Get started".
Clicking the "Get started" button navigates to /plans using the existing TanStack Router Link navigation (no full page reload).
The previously-present secondary hero button is not rendered on the Home page hero.

file_operations.description: Update marketingContent.hero.primaryCTA to exactly "Get started" (and leave other pages' content unchanged unless required for the Home hero).

Remove the secondary hero Button/Link (currently rendering marketingContent.hero.secondaryCTA to /about) so only a single primary Button remains; keep the existing TanStack Router <Link to="/plans"> for navigation and preserve the existing primary button styling.
